title: American Horror Story Weekly Wednesday Live Stream (Make Up)
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: Darn, I missed the live. I will just have to enjoy the playback.

my idea for the final season would be as followed: the title being ahs inferno and we revisit every single season per episode... for example episode 1 would be revisiting murder house, episode 2 asylum and so forth, and we get to see new scenes that took place during the events of each season that explain the connections and background behind the series. The final two episodes would be called inferno part 1 and 2 where everything basically breaks down and we find out that we, the viewers were put trough the nine circles of hell to find out the truth in the end. ryan murphy himself would have a guest role in the final episodes and reveal the secret to us.
Love you marry and thank you for your videos ! 😁

I think Apocalypse will have flashbacks to 2019, which could be the time the Apocalypse begins. The seasons timeline might be set 10 to 15 years into the future where it is in the middle of the Apocalypse.
Moody you're lucky school doesn't start here in Wyoming until September 4th
